Module it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.server.model.cards

Class PlayableCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.server.model.cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.server.model.cards.PlayableCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ResourceCard, StartingCard
public abstract class PlayableCard extends Card
Abstract class representing a playable card in the game. Extends the base class Card and provides methods to manipulate corners and game state.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayableCard

      public PlayableCard(int id, int points, Corner corner0, Corner corner1, Corner corner2, Corner corner3, Corner back0, Corner back1, Corner back2, Corner back3)
      Constructor to initialize a playable card with specific corners at front and back.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier of the card.
      points - Points associated with the card.
      corner0 - Corner 0 at the front of the card.
      corner1 - Corner 1 at the front of the card.
      corner2 - Corner 2 at the front of the card.
      corner3 - Corner 3 at the front of the card.
      back0 - Corner 0 at the back of the card.
      back1 - Corner 1 at the back of the card.
      back2 - Corner 2 at the back of the card.
      back3 - Corner 3 at the back of the card.

      Checks if the card is currently facing up.

    • setCornerCoverage

      public void setCornerCoverage(int cornerIndex, boolean covered)
      For testing purposes only: Sets the coverage state of a specific front corner.
      Parameters:
      cornerIndex - Index of the front corner to set coverage for (0 to 3).
      covered - Boolean indicating whether the corner is covered.
